div.p: That a Bullet let fall from any two points assign'd in the Curue HC. descends thereon to H in the same space of time j shall presently demonstrate. But first j aske that it be granted to me That the encrease of the velocity of the same body is alwayes in proportion to the power of the weight. As for instance, that (because the power of the weight is in proportion to the perpendicular altitude of the inclination of the plaine, as in Steuin liure 1. de la statique proposition 19. corollaire 2.)
